articles.description: Health Department Director Alisa Haushalter said the agency already had a stockpile of vaccinations earmarked for teachers when winter weather closed coronavirus vaccination sites for 10 days.
articles.content: A day after state health officials announced 2,400 doses of COVID-19 vaccine expired under lax Shelby County Health Department oversight, one employee has been fired, another has retired and the drum… [+8319 chars]

articles.title: Mahoning County Public Health to offer COVID-19 vaccines to new group - WKBN.com
articles.description: A slight increase in the number of COVID-19 vaccines that Mahoning County Public Health has received is allowing them to offer the vaccine to younger people.
articles.content:
